title: Game keeps freezing, just recently
body:
Just starting last night and continuing today, the game keeps freezing, requiring the whole computer to be restarted and reconnecting to the game.  It has gotten worse, now a match will freeze withing 1-5 seconds of loading up.  Problem only has so far occurred when playing with a friend on same wifi, his computer does not freeze.  Tried in safe mode, no freeze issues, but around 1.5 seconds constant lag time.

Since the windows 10 anniversary update just happened, it might be something to do with that, as apparently that has caused a lot of freezing, but I don't know why it only happens when I'm playing league of legends on wifi with someone else in the same game; when any of those conditions aren't true, it doesn't freeze.

Any ideas?

replies.body:
The Windows 10 Anniversary update made some changes to the Xbox app that enabled the Game DVR feature by default. This has been causing a number of problems with FPS, stuttering, and full PC lockups. Since it's a pretty simple step, I recommend disabling the game bar or game DVR entirely using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.
